BUSINESS CONTEXT:
- Contact: 0946-004-3002 (TGB ADMINS)
- Email: legerynpia@soleblessing.com
- Customer Philosophy: "Every customer is VIP family royalty"
- Auto-approval target: 85-90% of payments

VALID RECIPIENTS: "THE GOLD BLESSING", "GOLD BLESSING", "TGB", "LEGERYN PIA", "LEGERYN"

Extract payment information in EXACT JSON format:

{
  "transaction_id": "string - reference number",
  "amount": "number - PHP amount (no peso sign)",
  "recipient_name": "string - exact recipient name",
  "sender_name": "string - customer name",
  "payment_method": "string - GCash/Maya/BPI/etc",
  "transaction_datetime": "string - exact date/time PHT",
  "status": "string - SUCCESSFUL/PENDING/FAILED",
  "confidence_score": "number - 0-100 confidence",
  "recommended_action": "string - AUTO_APPROVE/MANUAL_REVIEW_4HR/CUSTOMER_CLARIFICATION"
}

PRIORITIZE CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: Assume positive intent, allow GCash/Maya fee variations (¬±‚Ç±100).

parameters.formDescription: Complete your jewelry order with us

values.fieldLabel: Do you want to use your previous shipping details?

parameters.jsCode:
// Get the form data directly from the form
const formData = $input.first().json;
const now = new Date();

// For now, treat all as new customers
const orderId = `TGB-${Date.now()}`;
const vipId = formData.vip_id || `VIP${Date.now().toString().slice(-8)}`;

// Build complete output for Google Sheets
return [{
  json: {
    ENTRY_DATE: now.toLocaleDateString('en-US'),
    CREATED_AT: now.toLocaleString('en-PH', {timeZone: 'Asia/Manila'}),
    ENTRY_MONTH: `${(now.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}/${now.getFullYear()}`,
    LAST_UPDATED: now.toLocaleString('en-PH', {timeZone: 'Asia/Manila'}),
    ORDER_ID: orderId,
    VIP_ID: vipId,
    CUSTOMER_NAME: formData.receiver_full_name || '',
    EMAIL: formData.customer_email || '',
    CONTACT_NUMBER: formData.contact_number || '',
    PAYMENT_STATUS: 'PENDING',
    PAYMENT_METHOD: formData.transaction_type || '',
    AMOUNT_DETECTED: '',
    AI_CONFIDENCE: '',
    VERIFICATION_STATUS: 'AWAITING_PAYMENT',
    RAFFLE_ENTRY_ID: (formData.transaction_type === 'Straight Payment') ? `RAFFLE-${Date.now()}` : 'N/A',
    RAFFLE_STATUS: (formData.transaction_type === 'Straight Payment') ? 'ELIGIBLE' : 'NOT_ELIGIBLE',
    WINNER_STATUS: (formData.transaction_type === 'Straight Payment') ? 'PENDING' : 'N/A',
    CUSTOMER_TYPE: 'NEW',
    CUSTOMER_TIER: 'BRONZE',
    POINTS_EARNED: '0',
    TOTAL_POINTS: '0',
    POINTS_USED: '0',
    POINTS_BALANCE: '0',
    POINTS_EXPIRY: new Date(Date.now() + 365*24*60*60*1000).toLocaleDateString('en-US'),
    SHIPPING_DETAILS_REUSED: 'NO',
    INVOICE_EMAIL_SENT: 'NO',
    CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT: 'NO',
    TRACKING_EMAIL_SENT: 'NO',
    LINK_FOR_INVOICE: '',  // ‚Üê ADDED: Admin will manually add invoice link
    TRACKING_NUMBER: '',    // ‚Üê ADDED: Admin will manually add tracking number
    FULL_ADDRESS: formData.full_address || '',
    REGION: formData.region || '',
    CITY: formData.city || '',
    SPECIAL_REQUEST: formData.special_requests || '',
    INVENTORY_CODES: '',
    CUSTOMER_EMAIL_VERIFIED: 'NO'
  }
}];
